DOC.brief_summary: This laboratory study collect tumor tissue blood sample patient gynecologic tumor . Collecting store sample tumor tissue blood patient cancer study laboratory may help study cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Collecting Tumor Samples From Patients With Gynecological Tumors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To collect gynecologic tissue blood participate Gynecologic Oncology Group ( GOG ) institution . II . To provide repository long-term storage gynecologic tissue blood use study design well understand molecular biology gynecologic tumor . III . To make available , GOG Tissue Bank , tissue blood propose project conduct GOG non-GOG investigator . OUTLINE : Snap frozen tumor tissue , OCT mold tumor tissue , formalin-preserved tumor tissue , buffy coat-prepared tumor tissue , blood sample collect stored repository . Patient information keep confidential , patient inform research/test result use tissue .
DOC.criteria: Any following : Patients gynecologic tissue remove surgery diagnosis , treat , monitor , and/or prevent primary , persistent , recurrent gynecologic cancer ovary , peritoneum , fallopian tube , cervix , uterine corpus , vagina , vulva , meet least one follow criterion : Group A : Women underwent surgery , diagnose primary gynecologic malignancy ovary , cervix , uterine corpus , vulva , primary tumor , normal tissue , blood available submission protocol Patients ovarian cancer include stage , grade , common epithelial cell type Invasive cancer serous mucinous borderline tumor low malignant potential allow At least 1 gram frozen primary tumor tissue must submit protocol patient FIGO stage III IV epithelial ovarian cancer Patients invasive malignancy cervix uterine corpus include stage , grade , common cell type Patients squamous cell carcinoma vulva Group B : Women underwent surgery diagnose rare gynecologic malignancy ovary , peritoneum , fallopian tube , cervix , uterine corpus , vagina , vulva , gestational trophoblastic tumor , tumor arise endometriosis , tumor tissue available submission protocol Patients rare gynecologic malignancy ovary include malignant germ cell tumor ; sex cordstromal tumor ; malignant mixed mesodermal tumor ; clear cell , mucinous , small cell , transitional cell carcinoma ; malignant Brenner tumor ; borderline tumor low malignant potential ( except serous mucinous ) Patients rare gynecologic malignancy peritoneum , include primary peritoneal cancer mesothelioma Patients carcinoma fallopian tube Patients rare gynecologic malignancy cervix include verrucous , small cell , clear cell , serous , adenoid cystic carcinoma ; carcinoid tumor ; malignant mixed mesodermal tumor ; leiomyosarcoma Patients rare gynecologic malignancy uterine corpus include leiomyosarcoma ; malignant mixed mesodermal tumor ; endometrial stromal sarcoma ; smooth muscle tumor unknown malignant potential ; clear cell small cell carcinoma Patients rare gynecologic malignancy vagina include verrucous clear cell carcinoma ; melanoma ; embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma ; endodermal sinus tumor Patients rare gynecologic malignancy vulva include verrucous carcinoma ; melanoma ; aggressive angiomyxoma ; sarcoma ; malignant Paget 's disease ; Bartholin gland carcinoma Patients gestational trophoblastic tumor Patients tumor arise endometriosis Group C : Women underwent prophylactic oophorectomy least 1 gram ovarian tissue blood available submission protocol Group D : Women underwent surgery monitor treat persistent recurrent gynecologic malignancy ovary , peritoneum , fallopian tube , cervix , uterine corpus , vagina , vulva , persistent recurrent tumor , normal tissue , blood available submission protocol Concurrent primary cancer allow No benign cystic tumor ovary , include cystic epithelial tumor mature cystic teratoma Prior cytotoxic chemotherapy allow Prior hormonal therapy allow Prior radiotherapy allow Prior surgery allow No 6 week prior surgery
